meanings.definition: The beliefs or practices of a fraternal organization.
meanings.sent1: The fraternalisms of the group promote unity and support among members.
meanings.sent2: The fraternalisms of the organization include regular meetings and community service.
meanings.sent3: The fraternalisms of the club led to a hilarious mix-up during the charity event.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of individualism, the fraternalisms of the lodge shine like a beacon of togetherness.
meanings.sent5: The fraternalisms of the brotherhood are as strong as the bonds of family.

meanings.definition: The quality of being fraternal or brotherly.
meanings.sent1: The fraternalisms among the team members create a sense of camaraderie.
meanings.sent2: His actions towards his colleagues showed true fraternalisms.
meanings.sent3: The fraternalisms between the siblings made for a heartwarming family reunion.
meanings.sent4: The fraternalisms in the air were palpable during the charity event.
meanings.sent5: The fraternalisms in the group were evident in their mutual respect and support.
